hiveArticle.title: Why Gets Your Hand Dirty in Entrepreneurship
hiveArticle.body:
If I asked you to run 20 kms today in return for â‚¹20,00,000... You will not see the task of running as "hard work".

You will see it as a fantastic deal... An easy task that gives disproportionate returns.

People think entrepreneurship is hard work.

But look at what you could gain...

You will have financial freedom.

You can defy 9-5.

You'll never be at the receiving end.

You will work because you want to, not because you have to.

Now the "hard work" suddenly becomes a relatively easy task.

Now all you need to do is have the clarity to see the future.

Don't push yourself.

Just get pulled into it.
